Contributor.Department: Center of Excellence in Genomic Medicine Research

Platform.Title: [HuGene-1_0-st] Affymetrix Human Gene 1.0 ST Array [transcript (gene) version]
Platform.Description:
Affymetrix submissions are typically submitted to GEO using the GEOarchive method described at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/geo/info/geo_affy.html
June 03, 2009: annotation table updated with netaffx build 28 June 18, 2012: annotation table updated with netaffx build 32 July 01, 2016: annotation table updated with netaffx build 35

Column.Name: GB_LIST
Column.Description: GenBank and RefSeq Accessions from mrna_assignment column

Column.Name: SPOT_ID
Column.Description: genomic location of the transcript cluster in the version of the genome assembly used at annotation time. Coordinates are standard 1-based (length=stop-start+1).

Column.Name: RANGE_GB
Column.Description: NCBI RefSeq for chromosome of current build

Column.Name: total_probes
Column.Description: Total number of probes contained by this transcript cluster.

Column.Name: gene_assignment
Column.Description: Gene information for each assigned mRNA for mRNAs that corresponds to known genes (multipart).

Column.Name: mrna_assignment
Column.Description: Description of the public mRNAs that should be detected by the sets within this transcript cluster based on sequence alignment (multipart).

Column.Name: category
Column.Description: Array design category of the transcript cluster

Sample.Title: PTC BRAF wt 1

Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA from biospecimens was extracted using the Quagen RNeasy mini kit according to the manufacturer's instructions and integrity of RNA was checked using the Agilent Bioanalyzer.
Channel.Label: biotin
Channel.Label-Protocol: Biotinylated cRNAs were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Following fragmentation, 6 ug of cDNA were hybridized for 17 hr at 45C on GeneChip HuGene-1.0-st arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
Sample.Description: Sample name: LN-163-11R Gene expression data from PTC without a BRAF mutation
Sample.Data-Processing: Data were generated using the Affymetrix Expression Console Software using Affymetrix default analysis settings. Data were RMA normalized and analyzed with Partek Genomics Suite 6.5.

Channel.Label-Protocol: Biotinylated cRNAs were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 ug total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Following fragmentation, 6 ug of cDNA were hybridized for 17 hr at 45C on GeneChip HuGene-1.0-st arrays. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: GeneChips were scanned using the Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 7G.
Sample.Description: Sample name: TN-769-11R Gene expression data from normal thyroid tissue
Sample.Data-Processing: Data were generated using the Affymetrix Expression Console Software using Affymetrix default analysis settings. Data were RMA normalized and analyzed with Partek Genomics Suite 6.5.

Series.Title: Expression profiling in proliferative thyroid lesions of different histologies and normal thyroid tissue
Series.Summary: Experiment a) Establishment of expression profiles in conventional papillary thyroid carcinomas (PTCs) with a BRAF mutation vs. PTCs without a BRAF mutation and using normal thyroid (TN) specimens as reference. Experiment b) Establishment of expression profiles in follicular adenomas (FAs) of the thyroid and follicular variant of papillary thyroid carcinomas (FVPTCs).
Series.Overall-Design: We extracted DNA from specimens and performed mutational analysis in malignant lesions and extracted RNA that was processed and hybridized to Affymetrix microarrays.
